title: Melrose pledges to inject 1 billion pounds in GKN pension scheme
text: March 19, 2018 / 7:19 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago Melrose pledges to inject 1 billion pounds in GKN pension scheme Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON (Reuters) - Melrose ( MRON.L ), the turnaround specialist trying to buy British engineering firm GKN ( GKN.L ), said it would inject about 1 billion pounds ($1.39 billion) into GKN’s pension scheme, its latest attempt to convince shareholders to back its offer. FILE PHOTO: Branding is seen outside the headquarters of GKN in Redditch, Britain, March 12, 2018. REUTERS/Hannah McKay/File Photo “The proposal we have made to the trustees of up to 1 billion pounds of contributions under our ownership is a clear example of what Melrose does which is good for pensioners and shareholders alike and shows we are a good custodian for all stakeholders,” Melrose said in a statement on Monday. Reporting by Sarah Young; editing by Michael Holden
